page.title: 18BIRTH OF CRESTWOOD SCHOOL
page.content: "WELCOME TO THE TODAY COMMUNITY!" The billboard sign encourages the driver to bring the family Or business and explore the potential of Boyatt Wood. The leafy woodland path has now become the Tarmaced Woodside Avenue Which curves its way round where a red stadium has risen from The ever-shifting woodland floor; Crescent-shaped,in the midst of such historic woodland, The name was decided upon -CRESTWOOD- and the new school was founded. The caterpillar tracks of the heavy machinery chug and squelch, Struggling to find a hold in the bubbling quicksand. Reservoirs of mud congeal and flatten, Awaiting the Tarmac and paving stones. Impatient pigeons and storm-struck sea -gulls glide in ever-widening circles,
